title: Did a Christian School Expel a Student For Wearing Rainbow-Patterned Sweater?
subtitle: Whitefield Academy in Kentucky cited a 15-year-old student's alleged previous code violations and "a posture of morality and cultural acceptance" contrary to the school's beliefs in a photo posted to Facebook in December 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Whitefield Academy in Kentucky expelled a 15-year-old student for wearing a rainbow-patterned sweater and having a rainbow-designed birthday cake in a Facebook photograph.
